title: Robot set
info: The Robot set is a set of vanity items consisting of the Robot Mask, Robot Shirt, and Robot Pants. Its male and female variants are identical. It has a 5.26*1/19 (5.26%) chance to be obtained by opening a Goodie Bag from the Halloween event. When the Robot Shirt is equipped, the player will appear to have their arms facing forward when walking.
